column4: - Most common: Found on Miku Append, Mirai Akari and Shishiro Botan
Neutral blink
Happy blink
-- The first two winks usually combine to make 'Blink Happy'
Happy left-eye wink. Combines with ウィンク右 (happy right-eye wink) to make 笑い (happy blink)
Happy right-eye wink. Combines with ウィンク (happy left-eye wink) to make 笑い (happy blink)
-- The second two winks usually combine to make 'Blink'
Neutral left-eye wink. Combines with ｳｨﾝｸ２右 (neutral right-eye wink) to make まばたき (neutral blink)
Neutral right-eye wink. Combines with ウィンク２ (neutral left-eye wink) to make まばたき (neutral blink)
Both eyes closed as if calm, relaxed or sleeping
Both eyes closed making >< shapes. Has a variety of uses, confusion, wincing, xD face, xP face and more
Surprised eyes, often simply opened wider than normal
Staring eyes. Often, the upper eyelids become straight, horizontal lines
Slanted eyes. Often used for anger or a serious expression
aa viseme. Phonemes: A. Examples: car
CH viseme. Phonemes: tS, dZ, S. Examples: chair, join, she
U viseme. Phonemes: ou. Examples: book
E viseme. Phonemes: e. Examples: bed
O viseme. Phonemes: oh. Examples: toe
Mouth open, making a triangle shape
Mouth closed, lips making a cat face or cursive w shape
Lower the corners of the mouth, making a frown :(
Shrink (scale down) the pupils and irises of both eyes, typically towards the middle of the pupil
Rotate/bend eyebrows to make a serious expression
Rotate/bend eyebrows to make a cheerful expression, often used with 笑い (happy blink)
Rotate/bend eyebrows to make an angry expression, often used with ｷﾘｯ (slanted eyes)
Common: Found on both Miku Append and Mirai Akari
Eyes are replaced with white circles with thick, dark outlines to make a O.O or O_O face
Similar to Mouth Corner Lower and sometimes called N (n is the romaji of ん)
Lips together and straightened with the left and right sides angled downwards. The angle is usually less sharp than ∧ and more like ╱╲ or ︿
Make the iris and pupil disappear (usually by moving them backwards into the head, as opposed to shrinking them like in 瞳小), leaving only the scelera visible.
Common: Found on both Miku Append and Shishiro Botan
Tongue sticking out
Tongue sticking out, playfully. Often associated with a 'teehee' giggle/laugh
Raise the corners of the mouth, making a smile :)
Common: Found on both Mirai Akari and Shishiro Botan
Miku Append only
Meme(?) face with longer and pointier nose and chin like :^>
Results in a less pointy chin
Extras from Xoriu's MMD Chart
From other models:
often a blush from cheek to cheek like when anime/manga characters are drunk
